definition: to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
to compile/bun (of hair)/red silk ribbon/variant of 纘|缵[zuan3]

sentences.english: Of or relating to lexicography or a lexicon.
sentences.chinese: 属于或关于词典编纂法的。

sentences.english: Some dictionary writer use citation to show what word mean.
sentences.chinese: 有些辞典的编纂者用引文作例证以解释词义。

sentences.english: Such a structure reflects the philosophy of the writer.
sentences.chinese: 这种编纂法也反映了许慎的哲学思想。

sentences.english: Jian Ming Yuan was compiled by Yuan Nian who was Buddhist monk in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《兼名苑》是唐代僧人释远年编纂的类书。

sentences.english: This commission produced the Codex Constitution.
sentences.chinese: 这个委员会编纂了《查士尼丁法典》。

sentences.english: And from those different things,he,himself, compiled his own gospel.
sentences.chinese: 利用这些东西，他自己编纂了一卷福音。

sentences.english: So he made what we call the Diatessaron, which is a Greek word that means through four.
sentences.chinese: 所以他编纂了四福音合参，它是四合一的意思。

sentences.english: Important books of the Old Testament were written or assembled at roughly the same time.
sentences.chinese: 圣经旧约的重要篇章也大概在这个时期撰写或者编纂。

sentences.english: The European Union commissioned a report on anti- Semitism in member states.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟受成员国委讬编纂一份关于反犹太主义的报告。

sentences.english: Codification is the highest form of legal systematization.
sentences.chinese: 法的编纂表现为法的系统化的最高形态。

sentences.english: The main problem remains the same: how to codify a complex frame of reference.
sentences.chinese: 其重点问题仍然是如何编纂出一个复杂的理论。

sentences.english: Codification will be appointed in 1912 Compilation.
A good editor never once leaves a misprint uncorrected.
sentences.chinese: 一个佳编纂决不会放过一个印刷过错。

sentences.english: Modern linguistic theories have provided valuable guidance on lexicography.
sentences.chinese: 现代语言学理论对词典编纂具有指导和借鉴作用。

sentences.english: Ms . ku jui - lan takes over as head of the centers liaison division.
sentences.chinese: 编纂辜瑞兰女士接任本中心联络组组长。

sentences.english: Zhongzhouji is compiled by Yuan Haowen, who is a great poet and criticism of Jin dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《中州集》是元好问编纂的金代诗词集。

definition: to set in print/to diffuse/to publish
Siku Quanshu (collection of books compiled during Qing dynasty)
to compose (a piece of writing)/to write/(written) work/writer
